title: Brooke van Velden announces changes to hazardous substance rules for research labs
desc: Brooke van Velden says the updated hazardous substance regulations for research laboratories will save the industry billions.

title: Voters split on who Labour should rule out as governing options
desc: Leader Chris Hipkins has so far refused to say which parties Labour would or would not work with in a future government.

title: Doctors to Marcos: Slow down
desc: President Marcos’ activities remained limited to private meetings yesterday even as Malacañang maintained he was in “good condition” days after undergoing observation in a hospital for stomach “discomfort.”

title: 160,000-year-old sophisticated stone tools discovered in China may not have been made by Homo sapiens
desc: Archaeologists have found the oldest known evidence of hafted tools in East Asia, and they challenge a previously held assumption about stone tool use.

title: Kai Montinola grows closer to fellow Cebuano Kyle Echarri after ‘Roja,’ ‘MMK’
desc: Before being paired as Ice and Olsen in “Roja,” viewers had already noticed the undeniable onscreen chemistry between Kai Montinola and Kyle Echarri when they first worked together in “Maalaala Mo Kaya.” They were featured in the June 21, 2025 episode, which told the story of viral content creators and couple Hajie Alejandro and Lenie Aycardo, also known online as “Team HaNie.”

title: Eddie Awards 2026 Nominations List From American Cinema Editors
desc: American Cinema Editors has revealed the nominees for its 76th annual Eddie Awards on February 27 at UCLA's Royce Hall. See the full list.

title: Alcaraz flicks on genius switch to put himself two matches from career grand slam
